programme.title: Susan George
programme.short_synopsis: Michael Parkinson's castaway is actress Susan George
programme.medium_synopsis: Michael Parkinson's castaway is actress Susan George.
programme.long_synopsis:
The actress Susan George began her career as a child appearing in television plays and series; her subsequent film career stretches back some 20 years. In conversation with Michael Parkinson, she recalls her roles on stage and screen and also her latest involvement in production and writing.

[Taken from the original programme material for this archive edition of Desert Island Discs]

Favourite track: Ev'ry Time We Say Goodbye by Ella Fitzgerald
Book: Will You Be My Friend? by James Kavanaugh
Luxury: Four poster bed

programme.title: Desert Island Discs
programme.short_synopsis: Kirsty Young invites her castaway guests to share the soundtrack of their lives.
